&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, he_so,thue_nt,rtrim(a.tk_vt) as tk_vt,thue,b.gia_ton,b.nhieu_dvt,b.lo_yn, case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri where dmvitri.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(b.tk_dt) as tk_dt, rtrim(b.tk_gghb) as tk_gghb, c.loai_tk as kieu_dt, c.loai_tk as kieu_gg &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; &DetailTaxFieldsBaseRef; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d81$000000 a cross join dmvt b cross join dmtk c&DetailTaxJoin; right join (select top 0 null a) aa on 1 = 0 right join (select top 0 null b) bb on 1 = 0 right join (select top 0 null c) cc on 1 = 0
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, he_so,thue_nt,rtrim(a.tk_vt) as tk_vt,thue,b.gia_ton,b.nhieu_dvt,b.lo_yn, case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri where dmvitri.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(b.tk_dt) as tk_dt, rtrim(b.tk_gghb) as tk_gghb, c.loai_tk as kieu_dt, d.loai_tk as kieu_gg &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&DetailTaxFieldsBaseRef; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d81$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmtk c on b.tk_dt = c.tk left join dmtk d on b.tk_gghb = d.tk &DetailTaxJoin; '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
